disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Glorious Evolution.

blurb.value: Viktor starts with the Prototype Hex Core that can be upgraded three times in the store to augment his abilities.

description.value: Innate: Viktor starts each game with an exclusive Prototype Hex Core, which permanently occupies one of his item slots. For some additional gold, Viktor can upgrade his Hex Core to increase its bonuses and grant him one Evolution point, which he can use to augment one of his basic abilities. Once he augments all of his basic abilities, Viktor automatically augments his ultimate ability, Chaos Storm. Prototype Hex Core: Grants 1 − 18 (based on level) ability power and 10 − 180 (based on level) mana. Hex Core mk-1: Grants 3 − 54 (based on level) ability power and 15 − 270 (based on level) mana. Gives one Evolution point. Hex Core mk-2: Grants 6 − 108 (based on level) ability power and 20 − 360 (based on level) mana. Gives one Evolution point. Perfect Hex Core: Grants 10 − 180 (based on level) ability power and 25 − 450 (based on level) mana. Gives one Evolution point.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Siphon Power.

target range.value: 600

blurb.value: Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack. Augment: Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.

description.value: Active: Viktor shields himself for 30 − 115 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) for 2.5 seconds and hurls a projectile at the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and empowering Viktor with Discharge for 3.5 seconds.

description2.value: Discharge: Viktor's next basic attack becomes a non-projectile and is modified to deal magic damage against non- structures.

description3.value: Augment: Turbocharge: Viktor gains  30% bonus movement speed for 2.5 seconds after using Siphon Power, while also increasing the shield's value by 60%, up to 48 − 184 (based on level) (+ 32% AP).

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * All damage dealt by Spellblade on the enhanced attack is converted into magic damage. Spell shield does not prevent Viktor from gaining Discharge. Critical strike and  life steal only interact with the basic attack damage component. If the target dies, becomes untargetable, or Viktor loses sight of them during the cast time, Siphon Power cancels but does not go on  cooldown nor consumes any mana. Only the initial projectile can be blocked. PENDING FOR TEST: Discharge's interaction with parrying effects ( dodge, block, blind).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Gravity Field.

blurb.value: Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned. Augment: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.

description.value: Active: Viktor deploys a gravitational imprisonment device at the target location for 4 seconds. The trap arms after 0.75 seconds and slows all enemies within the field, persisting for 0.25 seconds after leaving the area or generating 3 stacks.

description2.value: Whilst under the trap's effects, enemies generate a stack every 0.5 seconds. At 3 stacks, enemies are knocked down and stunned for 1.5 seconds but become immune to the slow from Gravity Field and cannot generate stacks again. This may only occur once per cast.

description3.value: Augment: Magnetize: Viktor's damaging abilities, excluding Chaos Storm's per second damage, slow enemies hit by 20% for 1 second.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value:
* Gravity Field will remain active if Viktor dies.
 Gravity Field's animation can be seen by both teams through fog of war.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Death Ray.

blurb.value: Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path. Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.

description.value: Active: Viktor uses his synthetic arm to fire an energy beam 500 units down the target path, dealing magic damage to every enemy it hits. The arm can fire in any direction from any point within range.

description2.value: Augment: Aftershock: An explosion follows Death Ray's wake after 1 second, dealing additional magic damage.

leveling2.value: Aftershock Magic Damage:»20 / 60 / 100 / 140 / 180 (+ 70% AP)«Total Magic Damage:90 / 170 / 250 / 330 / 410 (+ 130% AP)

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Viktor may freely act while the ray is traveling. The effected area is set upon casting, no matter how far away Viktor moves. Unlike a leash, Death Ray will not break off its own effect. The laser grants a moderate area of sight around where the beam strikes the ground. If Death Ray is intercepted, the initial ray is not destroyed. However, the capability to be blocked only applies to the laser as it hits the ground. Viktor can cast the ability over the wall and it will not be destroyed or intercepted. Augmented Death Ray will still cause the entire target area to explode even if the laser is blocked. If Viktor dies while he is firing the beam it only deals damage up to the location at the time of his death.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Chaos Storm.

blurb.value: Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity. Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.

description.value: Active: Viktor conjures an arcane singularity at the target location, dealing magic damage to every enemy it hits and disrupting channeled abilities. The singularity remains active for 6.5 seconds afterwards, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the storm every second and granting sight of the inside area and its surroundings. Chaos Storm can be recast at any time within its duration.

description2.value: Recast: Viktor directs the singularity to the target location. Once the singularity damages an enemy champion, it automatically follows them until the target dies or escapes it. The singularity moves faster based on its proximity to Viktor.

description3.value: Augment: Perfect Storm: Chaos Storm moves 25% faster.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The disrupt is 'wrapped' into a status effect that says the target is Silenced for 0.25 seconds, but it does not actually silence. It however makes sure that the disrupt is prevented by immunity to silences. Chaos Storm will remain active and follow the targeted enemy champion even if Viktor dies. Chaos Storm reaches its maximum speed at 300 units and minimum speed at 900 units away from Viktor. Including the initial damage, Chaos Storm deals 7 instances of damage. Chaos Storm can be controlled by alt + right click or by pressing the R button (default hotkeys). It can be commanded to move toward locations or enemy champions (it will continue to follow the chosen enemy champion unless commanded otherwise). Commands cannot be issued to the singularity while this ability is disabled by crowd control. The storm will follow its target even if they are not visible, effectively giving away their position. Chaos Storm is not obstructed by terrain.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
